Kiyovu Sports vs APR FC

Kiyovu Sports 0-0 APR FC

Uko umukino uri kugenda

Umwanditsi

: Eric Tony Ukurikiyimfura

Amafoto

: Ntare Julius

19:30

APR FC itakaje amanota biyishyira ku gitutu

Kunganya uyu mukino bitumye APR FC igira amanota 58 ku mwanya wa mbere, aho irusha Rayon Sports amanota ane. Gikundiro yo izakina umukino w'umunsi wa 25 wa shampiyona ku wa Kane ubwo izaba yakiriye Espoir FC hano kuri Stade ya Kigali.

Kiyovu Sports yo igize amanota 39 ku mwanya wa gatanu, isigara irushwa inota rimwe na Police FC ya kane. Iyi kipe y'abashinzwe umutekano izakira Sunrise FC ejo ku wa Gatatu hano kuri Stade ya Kigali.

Mwakoze cyane abo twabanye kuri uyu mukino,tuzasubira ku munsi w'ejo ku mukino wa Police FC na Sunrise FC.

19:25

Umukino urarangiye: Amakipe yombi agabanye amanota

Umusifuzi Uwikunda Samuel asoje umukino. Kiyovu Sports na APR FC zigabanye amanota nyuma yo kunganya ubusa ku busa ku munsi wa 25 wa shampiyona. Abakinnyi ba APR FC bahise bajya mu rwambariro mu gihe aba Kiyovu Sports babanje kujya gushimira abafana babo.

19:23

90+4' Kiyovu Sports ihushije igitego

Bonane Janvier ateye umupira atungura umunyezamu Kimenyi Yves, awukoraho gato ujya muri koruneri itewe na Kalisa Rachid abakinnyi ba APR FC bakiza izamu.

19:16

90' Iminota y'inyongera

Umusifuzi wa kane yerekanye iminota itanu y'inyongera. Ese ni nde utahana amanota y'umunsi?

19:15

89' Kiyovu Sports yatesheje amanota APR FC mu mwaka ushize w'imikino

Mu mwaka ushize w'imikino, Kiyovu Sports na bwo yihagazeho imbere ya APR FC ubwo yari yayakiriye, iyitsinda igitego 1-0.

Intsinzi ya Kiyovu Sports KU GITEGO 1-0 ku wa 27 Ukwakira 2017 yaje nyuma y'imyaka 12 Urucaca rudatsinda APR FC. pic.twitter.com/3NvlurBtVK

— Scout (@scoutrw) April 30, 2019


19:13

87' Umukino uhagaze gato

Ku mupira uje mu kirere, abakinnyi ba APR FC n'aba Kiyovu Sports bagiye kuwurwanira, Karera Hassan akinirwa nabi.

19:10

84' Ubwugarizi bwa Kiyovu Sports buhagaze neza

APR FC ikomeje gusatira iashaka igitego. Ubwugarizi bwa Kiyovu Sports bukomeje guhagarara neza, aho nta mukinnyi wa APR FC ubasha kubarenza umupira.

19:06

80' Gusatirana gukomeye

Kiyovu Sports ibonye koruneri ku mupira wa Rachid urengejwe na Ally. Itewe n'uyu kapiteni wa Kiyovu, APR FC ihita ikora contre-attaque umupira Savio ashatse kuwuha Omborenga ujya hanze.

19:03

77' Abafana ba APR FC bari bikanze penaliti

Niyonzima Ally ahaye umupira Mugunga Yves yinjira mu rubuga rw'amahina, ashatse gutambuka hagati y'abakinnyi ba Kiyovu Sports agwa mu rubuga rw'amahina, umusifuzi avuga ko ntacyabaye. Ndoli akuyemo ubundi buryo bubonetse kuri APR FC mbere y'uko Ally Niyonzima atera umupira n'umutwe ukajya hanze.

19:02

75' Umupira ugaruwe n'umutambiko w'izamu

Kapiteni wa Kiyovu Sports, Kalisa Rachid, ateye umupira w'umuterekano muri koruneri ugarurwa n'umutambiko w'izamu urarenga.

19:00

74' Gusimbuza kwa Kiyovu Sports

Nsanzimfura Keddy wavunitse asimbuwe na Bonane Janvier ugiye gukina mu kibuga hagati. Kiyovu Sports yakoresheje abakinnyi bakiri bato mu mukino w'uyu munsi.

18:56

70' Gusimbuza kwa APR FC

APR FC ikoze impinduka ya nyuma: Mugunga Yves asimbuye Nshimiyimana Imran wagize akabazo k'imvune mu kanya kashize. Uyu rutahizamu ukiri muto agiye gufatanya na Danny Usengimana na Muhadjiri mu bashaka ibitego.

18:54

67' Saleh agiye kuvurirwa hanze

Ishimwe Saleh wa Kiyovu Sports agize akabazo gato ajya kuvurirwa hanze n'abaganga b'ikipe ye. Umukino uhise ukomeza, APR FC isatiriye umupira ufatwa na Ndoli Jean Claude.

18:50

64' Umukino uhagaze gato

Umukinnyi wo hagati wa APR FC Imran Nshimiyimana agize akabazo k'imvune, umukino uhagaze gato yitabwaho n'abaganga.

18:49

61' Ikarita y'umuhondo kuri APR FC

Omborenga Fitina ahawe ikarita y'umuhondo akiniye nabi Ngarambe Ibrahim mu kibuga hagati. Kiyovu Sports yakinnye n'imbaraga nyinshi, aho APR FC yisanze iri gukora amakosa menshi cyane.

18:47

58' Gusimbuza kwa APR FC

APR FC ikoze impinduka ya kabiri: Niyonzima Ally yinjiye mu kibuga asimbura Buteera Andrew mu kibuga hagati. Migi na Ally bagiye gufatanya mu gihe imbere yabo haraza kuba hari Savio, Muhadjiri na Imran Nshimiyimana.

18:47

58' Gusimbuza kwa APR FC

APR FC ikoze impinduka ya kabiri: Niyonzima Ally yinjiye mu kibuga asimbura Buteera Andrew mu kibuga hagati. Migi na Ally bagiye gufatanya mu gihe imbere yabo haraza kuba hari Savio, Muhadjiri na Imran Nshimiyimana.

18:43

57' Umupira ugaruwe n'umutambiko w'izamu

Herron Berrian acenze Buregeya Prince, asubiza umupira inyuma kuri Nsanzimfura Keddy uteye ishoti rikomeye umupira ugarurwa n'umutambiko w'izamu.

18:41

55' Ikarita y'umuhondo kuri APR FC

Kapiteni wa APR FC Mugiraneza Jean Baptiste 'Migi' ahawe ikarita y'umuhondo akiniye nabi Herron Berrian wa Kiyovu Sports.

18:40

53' APR FC ihushije igitego cyabazwe

HakizimanaMuhadjiri azamukanye umupira, awuhindura ku ruhande rwa Savio Nshuti winjiye mu rubuga rw'amahina atera mu izamu, Ndoli awukozeho usumba Danny Usengimana wari winjiye, Mukonya ahita awushyira muri koruneri.

18:36

50' Gusimbuza kwa APR FC

Nshuti Dominique Savio waherukaga gukina ku mukino wa Rayon Sports yavuyemo avunitse, yinjiye mu kibuga asimbura Nkinzingabo Fiston bitakundiye uyu munsi.

18:35

48' Kiyovu Sports ihushije igitego cyabazwe

Rutsiro yinjiranye umupira mu rubuga rw'amahina asize Migi wongeye kumureka mu rubuga rw'amahina, umunyezamu Kimenyi Yves yasaga n'uwamaze kwemera ibiba byose ariko umupira ugeze kuri Nsanzimfura Keddy akoraho gato ujya hanze.

18:34

47' Coup-franc ya Kiyovu Sports

Nizeyimana Jean Claude 'Rutsiro' yambuye Rugwiro umupira, agerageje gucenga Omborenga awukora n'ukuboko, umusifuzi atanga coup-franc itewe na Nsanzimfura Keddy umupira ufatwa na Kimenyi Yves abanje kwiyongeza.

18:31

Igice cya kabiri kiratangiye

Kiyovu Sports itangije igice cya kabiri cy'umukino n'ubundi abakinnyi bayo batangira basatira ikipe ya APR FC.

18:19

Igice cya mbere kirarangiye

Mu gihe umusifuzi wo ku ruhande, Ambroise, yari avuze ko Herron Berrian yarayemo, umusifuzi wo hagati Uwikunda Samuel asoza igice cya mbere cy'uyu mukino. Amakipe yombi agiye kumva inama z'abatoza.

18:16

45' Iminota y'inyongera

Umusifuzi wa kane yerekanye iminota ibiri y'inyongera. Kiyovu Sports ikomeje gusatira aho yongeye kubona uburyo bwiza ku mupira uhinduwe na Nizeyimana Jean Claude usumba Keddy na Herron Berrian bari bamanutse kuwutsinda, urarenga.

18:14

42' Ikarita y'umuhondo kuri Kiyovu Sports

Ishimwe Saleh wa Kiyovu Sports akiniye nabi Hakizimana Muhadjiri mu kibuga hagati, ahabwa ikarita y'umuhondo. Iyi ibaye iya kabiri ku ruhande rwa Kiyovu Sports n'iya gatatu muri rusange.

18:13

41' Kiyovu Sports ihushije igitego cyabazwe

Ku mupira utakajwe na Hakizimana Muhadjiri, Kiyovu Sports yinjiye mu rubuga rw'amahina rwa APR FC, Mugiraneza Jean Baptiste yabonye ko ashobora gukorera ikosa kuri rutahizamu Nizeyimana Jean Claude aramureka, uyu ushatse kuroba Kimenyi umupira uramutenguha ukomeza imbere y'izamu.

18:11

40' Nta kipe iratera mu izamu

Amakipe yombi akomeje gucungana. Kugeza ubu nta kipe iratera umupira ugana mu izamu haba ku ruhande rwa Kiyovu Sports na APR FC uretse uburyo bwabonetse ku munota wa mbere Ndoli Jean Claude agasohoka, agasubiza umupira wa Omborenga Fitina inyuma.

18:06

35' Ubwugarizi bwa Kiyovu Sports buhagaze neza

APR FC iri kunyuzamo igasatira Kiyovu Sports. Karera Hassan, Rwabuhihi Placide na Ahoyikuye Jean Paul bahagaze neza mu bwugarizi aho imipira myinshi bari kuyisubiza inyuma itaragera ku munyezamu Ndoli Jean Claude.

18:04

Ikarita y'umuhondo kuri APR FC

Hakizimana Muhadjiri utishimiye ko umusifuzi Uwikunda Samuel atasifuye ubwo yakinirwaga nabi hafi n'izamu rya Kiyovu Sports, ahawe ikarita y'umuhondo. Hakizimana yakiniye Kiyovu Sports mbere yo kwerekeza muri Mukura Victory Sports yavuyemo ajya muri APR FC ariko abanje gusinyira AS Kigali yahise imutiza.

18:01

29' Ikarita y'umuhondo kuri Kiyovu Sports

Ahoyikuye Jean Paul 'Mukonya' akiniye nabi Danny Usengimana ahabwa ikarita y'umuhondo. Iri kosa rihanwe na Ombirenga Fitina, umusifuzi avuga ko umukinnyi wa APR FC yakoze ikosa mu rubuga rw'amahina asunika uwa Kiyovu Sports.

17:59

28' Kiyovu Sports iri gukora amakosa menshi

Kalisa Rachid akiniye nabi Imanishimwe Emmanuel 'Mangwende' inyuma y'urubuga rw'amahina, ikosa rihanwe na Muhadjiri umusifuzi avuga ko APR FC yakoze ikosa mu rubuga rw'amahina, umupira uterekwa imbere y'izamu rya Ndoli.

17:57

25' Coup-franc ya APR FC

Myugariro wa Kiyovu Sports Rwabuhihi Placide akoreye ikosa kuri Hakizimana Muhadjiri wihaniye ikosa, Nshimiyimana Imran na Danny Usengimana bari bageze mu izamu, umupira ugarurwa na Ndoli Jean Claude ariko umusifuzi wo ku ruhande avuga ko hari habayeho kurarira.

17:53

22' Coup-franc ya Kiyovu Sports

Buteera Andrew akiniye nabi kapiteni wa Kiyovu Sports Kalisa Rachid inyuma y'rubuga rw'amahina. Iri kosa rihanwe na Nsanzimfura Keddy umupira ugonga urukuta uramugarukira, asubijemo ujya hanze y'izamu rya Kimenyi Yves.

17:50

19' Rutahizamu wa Kiyovu Sports agize akabazo

Nizeyimana Jean Claude wa Kiyovu Sports agize akabazo k'imvune ajya kuvurirwa hanze n'umuganga w'ikipe. Umukino ukomeje kurangwa n'amakosa menshi hagati mu kibuga.

17:49

Mu yindi mikino: AS Kigali yatsindiwe i Gicumbi

Umukino wabimburiye iyindi y'umunsi wa 25 wa shampiyona wabereye mu Majyaruguru, Gicumbi FC itsinda AS Kigali igitego 1-0 cyatsinzwe na Ahishakiye Nabil nyuma y'amakosa yakozwe n'umunyezamu Bate Shamiru watereye umupira hanze y'urubuga rwe.

17:45

14' Umupira urarenga buri kanya

Nta mwanya umupira umara mu kibuga umusifuzi adasifuye ko habaye ikosa cyangwa ko umupira warenze. Amakipe yombi yatangiye ahuzaguruka n'ubwo abakinnyi banyuzamo bagasatira izamu, ariko nta buryo bukomeye bugana mu izamu buraboneka muri iyi minota 14 ishize.

17:42

10' Serumogo Ally yari ahaye akazi gakomeye APR FC

Myugariro w'iburyo wa Kiyovu Sports, Serumogo, azamukanye umupira agera ahagana muri koruneri, awuhinduriye mu izamu ukurwaho na Rugwiro uteresheje umutwe mbere y'uko Imanishimwe Emmanuel 'Mangwende' awutera imbere.

17:39

7' Kiyovu Sports yihariye umupira mu kibuga

Abakinnyi bakiri bato ba Kiyovu Sports yaba Ishimwe Saleh, Nsanzimfura Keddy na Rwabuhihi Placide uri gukina inyuma kugeza ubu bahagaze neza muri iyi minota ibanza y'umukino. APR FC iri gusatira inyuze ku mpande aho urw'ibiryo arirwo ruri gukoreshwa cyane.

17:35

4' Umupira urava ku izamu rimwe ujya ku rindi

Nyuma yo gusatira kwa APR FC, Kiyovu Sports na yo yahise ifata umupira isatira izamu rya APR FC ariko Rugwiro akiza izamu. Kiyovu Sports yongeye gusatira binyuze kuri Serumogo Ally, umupira ateye ufatwa na Kimenyi Yves.

17:32

1' Omborenga Fitina ahushije igitego cyabazwe

Ku mupira aherejwe, uturutse mu ruhande rw'iburyo, Omborenga Fitina awinjiranye mu rubuga rw'amahina, umunyezamu Ndoli Jean Claude arasohoka awukuraho. Omborenga na Ndoli bombi bari guhura n'amakipe bakiniye.

17:30

Umukino uratangiye

Umusifuzi Uwikunda Samuel atangije umukino. Danny Usengimana akoze ku mupira bwa mbere akinana na Muhadjiri usubije inuma kuri bagenzi, Nizeyimana Jean Claude wa Kiyovu Sports akora ikosa rihanwe na Rugwiro Herve.



Kiyovu Sports yambaye imipira y'umweru, amakabutura y'icyatsi n'amasogisi y'icyatsi mu gihe APR FC yambaye imyenda y'umukara ikunda kwambara iyo yasohotse.

17:22

Imvura itumye abafana bimukira mu yindi myanya

Mu gihe habura iminota 10 ngo umukino nyir'izina utangire, imvura itari nyinshi yatangiye kugwa kuri Stade ya Kigali, aho itumye abafana bari bicaye ahadatwikiriye bimukira ahatwikiriye. Umubare munini w'abafana bari bicaye mu gice giteganye n'imyanya yiyubashye, ariko imvura itumye bahava bagana ahatwikiriye..

17:11

Abakinnyi ba APR FC bagera ku kibuga

17:09

Abakinnyi ba Kiyovu Sports bagera ku kibuga

17:04

Abakinnyi babanjemo ku mpande zombi

Ku ruhande rwa Kiyovu Sports, umutoza Kirasa Alain yakoze impinduka enye ugereranyije n'ikipe yatsinzwe na AS Kigali.

Kiyovu SC: Ndoli Jean Claude, Ahoyikuye Jean Paul, Karera Hassan, Rwabuhihi Aimee Placide, Ishimwe Saleh, Ngarambe Ibrahim, Kalisa Rachid, Nsanzimfura Keddy, Serumogo Ally, Herron Berrian na Nizeyimana Jean Claude.

Umutoza wa APR FC, Zlatko Krmpotic yakoze impinduka imwe Omborenga Fitina abanza mu kibuga mu mwanya wa Rusheshangoga Michel.

APR FC:Kimenyi Yves, Omborenga Fitina, Imanishimwe Emmanuel, Rugwiro Herve, Buregeya Prince, Mugiraneza Jean Baptiste (c), Nshimiyimana Imran, Buteera Andrew, Nkinzingabo Fiston, Hakizimana Muhadjiri na Danny Usengimana.

15:50

Kiyovu Sports irashaka umwanya wa kane mu gihe APR FC ishaka igikombe

Amakipe yombi arajya gukina uyu mukino afite intego zitandukanye: Kiyovu Sports ya gatanu n'amanota 38, irashaka kwisubiza umwanya wa kane yatakaje mu mpera z'icyumweru gishize ubwo yatsindwaga na AS Kigali mu gihe APR FC ya mbere n'amanota 57 nta kosa ishaka gukora mu gihe ishaka kwisubiza igikombe cya shampiyona.

15:46

Muhadjiri arongera gusubiza Jules Ulimwengu?

Ku Cyumweru, rutahizamu wa Rayon Sports, Ulimwengu Jules, yatsinze ibitego bibiri yongera kuyobora abatsinze byinshi n'ibitego 14, aho yahise ajya imbere Hakizimana Muhadjiri wari waraye atsinze Bugesera FC ibitego bitatu, akagira ibitego 13.

Hakizimana Muhadjiri uraza kuba ahura na Kiyovu Sports yakiniye mbere yo kujya muri Mukura Victory Sports ni umwe mu bitezwe mu mukino wo kuri uyu wa Kabiri.

15:42

Kiyovu Sports igorwa cyane no kwihagararaho imbere ya APR FC

APR FC yatsinze Kiyovu Sports igitego 1-0 mu mikino ibanza cyatsinzwe na Byiringiro Lague. Kiyovu Sports ikunze kugorwa cyane na APR FC aho yatsinze umukino umwe gusa mu mikino 19 iheruka guhuza amakipe yombi.

@SCKiyovuSports vs @aprfcofficial3 H2H

Mu mikino 31 iheruka guhuza amakipe yombi muri shampiyona, APR yatsinzemo 23, Kiyovu itsinda 3, banganya 5.
APR FC yatsinze imikino 18 muri 19 iheruka guhuriramo na Kiyovu Sports. pic.twitter.com/usCklGF7oq

— Scout (@scoutrw) April 30, 2019


15:35

Kiyovu Sports irabura zimwe mu nkingi za mwamba

Kiyovu Sports irakira uyu mukino idafite bamwe mu bakinnyi ngederwaho barimo kapiteni wayo Ngirimana Alexis, Habamahoro Vincent, Nizeyimana Djuma wa gatatu mu bamaze gutsinda ibitego byinshi uyu mwaka, Armel Ghislain ufite ikarita itukura, na Shavy Babicka uheruka kugirira imvune muri Gabon, aba bose bakaba bari babanje mu kibuga mu mukino ubanza.

15:31

Ikaze kuri Stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo

Tubahaye ikaze kuri Stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo hagiye kubera umukino w'umunsi wa 25 wa shampiyona uhuza Kiyovu Sports na APR FC.
Uyu mukino wagombaga gutangira ku masaha asanzwe (15:30) ariko kubera guhurirana n'iminsi y'imibyizi, Kiyovu Sports isaba FERWAFA ko wakinwa saa 17:30 ndetse ukavanwa ku kibuga cyayo cya Mumena ugashyirwa i Nyamirambo.
